EmailTemplate.subject: Deposition Followup - {!Deposition__c.Deponent_Name__c} - {!Deposition__c.Deposition_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for handling the deposition of {!Deposition__c.Deponent_Name__c} on {!Deposition__c.Deposition_Date__c} in the matter of {!Deposition__c.Case_Name__c}.
Our system shows the final transcript is due by 10:30 am on {!Deposition__c.Transcript_Due_From_Reporter__c}. If you believe this final delivery date is in error, please contact us immediately.
Once the final transcript is ready, please upload it by clicking on this link. Please include the full order from all clients and the invoice for this {!Deposition__c.Event_Type_Lowercase__c}.
Please ship any exhibits to our production center below via a traceable method such as UPS or FedEx. If you believe the client may need access to the exhibits sooner, please feel free to upload them and ship the originals to us when they are available.
We strive to meet 100% of the promised delivery deadlines to our clients. If you believe there is any possibility that this final transcript might not be ready on or before the due date and time above, please contact us immediately at 888.267.1200 or transcripts@LexitasNG.com.
Thank you.
